content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Mr. Abbasi, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. Let's discuss the rental price. What is your budget for such a place?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I am a smart and responsible student, so I want to get the best deal possible. I am looking for an apartment that fits my needs, and I believe your apartment could be a good fit. I am willing to pay 400 euros per month for an unfurnished apartment like yours.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: 400 euros per month is a very reasonable offer, Mr. Abbasi. However, considering the prime location of the apartment and the recent construction, I was hoping for a slightly higher rent. How would you feel about increasing your offer to 450 euros per month? This would reflect the quality and desirability of the property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your response, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate the quality of your apartment. However, I believe that 400 euros per month is a fair price for this apartment. I am a dependable and responsible tenant, and I am willing to pay this amount. I hope we can find a mutual agreement.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand that you are a responsible tenant, and I appreciate your willingness to pay a fair price. Let's compromise. How about 425 euros per month? This is a good balance between your budget and the value of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your proposal, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to pay 420 euros per month for the apartment. I believe this is a fair price for both parties. I hope we can find a mutual agreement.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Your offer of 420 euros per month is very close to my counteroffer of 425 euros. Considering your reliability as a tenant, I am willing to accept your offer. 

I agree to the price of 420 Euro!

Let's proceed with the paperwork, and I'm looking forward to having you as a tenant. Thank you for choosing my apartment, and I'm sure we'll have a fruitful relationship.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I appreciate your willingness to work with me on the price. I am confident that we will have a successful and long-lasting rental relationship. I am excited to move into your apartment. Is there anything else we need to discuss before we proceed with the paperwork?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Not at all, Mr. Abbasi. I'm delighted to have you as a tenant. We can proceed with the paperwork once you're ready. Is there anything specific you would like to discuss or include in the contract?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I am confident that we can proceed with the standard contract terms. I am looking forward to signing the lease. If there are any additional terms or conditions, please let me know. Otherwise, I am ready to sign the lease and move forward with the rental agreement.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Wonderful, Mr. Abbasi. I'll prepare the lease agreement with the standard terms and conditions. We can meet at the apartment to sign the papers and finalize the arrangement. Would you prefer to meet tomorrow or the day after?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I am available to meet and sign the lease agreement tomorrow. I look forward to meeting you at the apartment. Please let me know the time we can meet, and I will be there.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Excellent, Mr. Abbasi. I'll be at the apartment at 10:00 am tomorrow. Please feel free to come by at that time, and we'll go over the lease together. I'm looking forward to finalizing everything with you. Thank you for your time today.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I will be at the apartment at 10:00 am tomorrow. I am looking forward to meeting you and signing the lease. If there are any issues or changes, please let me know as soon as possible. Otherwise, I will see you at the apartment tomorrow at 10:00 am.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: No worries, Mr. Abbasi. I'll have everything ready for your arrival. If there's anything new that comes up, I'll contact you immediately. See you tomorrow at 10:00 am. Thank you once again for choosing my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. I will see you at the apartment tomorrow at 10:00 am. If there are any issues or changes, please let me know as soon as possible. Otherwise, I will see you at the apartment tomorrow at 10:00 am.

TERMINATE
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran
